LandingPage.subHeading: Your AI-powered multilingual telehealth assistant. Get medical information, find doctors, schedule appointments, and more – in Wolof, French, and English.
LandingPage.multilingualSupportDesc: Communicate in Wolof, French, or English. Our platform is designed for seamless multilingual interaction.
LandingPage.aiChatAssistantDesc: Get answers to medical questions via text or voice. Our AI transcribes audio and provides spoken responses.
LandingPage.portalsDesc: Manage appointments, view profiles, and access your health information easily through dedicated dashboards.
LandingPage.bridgeDesc: Visualizing a healthier, more connected world.
LandingPage.bridgePara: MediLingua Connect aims to make healthcare information accessible to everyone, regardless of language barriers. Our platform is designed with empathy and built with cutting-edge technology to serve diverse communities.
LandingPage.advancedSearchDesc: Find doctors by specialty, location (including 'near me'), and languages spoken.
LandingPage.videoConsultationsDesc: Connect with healthcare professionals through secure video calls directly on the platform.
LandingPage.appointmentSchedulingDesc: Easily book, manage, and get reminders for your medical appointments.

VideoConsultationPage.title: Video Consultation
VideoConsultationPage.description: Connecting you securely with your healthcare provider.
VideoConsultationPage.accessRequiredDescription: Please enable camera and microphone permissions in your browser settings to use video consultation. Refresh the page after enabling.
VideoConsultationPage.connectedDoctorsOnlyDescription: This video consultation feature is intended for use with doctors you are already connected with through the platform. Full connection management is under development.
VideoConsultationPage.uiDemoNote: Note: This is a UI demonstration. Actual video call functionality (peer-to-peer connection) and doctor connection system are not yet implemented.
VideoConsultationPage.endToEndEncryptionNote: For handling Protected Health Information (PHI), ensure video consultations use end-to-end encryption and all practices adhere to HIPAA or relevant local healthcare data privacy regulations.
